name: Wontons and Chili Oil
description: A quick and flavorful Chinese side dish featuring boiled wontons smothered in a savory and spicy sauce. This simple recipe combines the umami of soy sauce and black vinegar with the heat of chili oil, the nuttiness of sesame and peanuts, and a touch of sweetness, all garnished with fresh spring onion.

recipeInstructions.text: Bring a pot of water to boil. Boil wontons for about 4-5 minutes if fresh, about 6-7 minutes if frozen, or until cooked through.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook wontons

recipeInstructions.text: Drain wontons. Mix everything else and pour over wontons. Enjoy!
